input.subject: Survey completed - Jolie Ni
input.body:
Hi Gullie,

I completed the virtual survey for my SF to NYC move. Let me know next steps.

Thanks,
Jolie

output.subject: Thanks for completing your survey (SF to NYC)
output.body:
Hi Jolie,

Thanks for completing the virtual survey for your San Francisco -> New York move. We've sent it to the vendor and will share your quote as soon as it's ready.

If your delivery address finalizes before then, reply with the address so we can avoid storage.

Thanks,
Gullie Agent
